title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2391.2 - Principal offices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2391.2 - Principal offices

State Regulations

The principal office of the Commissioner of Taxation and

Finance is located at Building 9, Room 205, W.A. Harriman Campus, Albany, New

York 12227. The principal office of the Department of Taxation and Finance
(except the Division of Tax Appeals or the Tax Appeals Tribunal), for purposes
of serving legal process, is located at Building 9, W.A. Harriman Campus, Albany, New York 12227. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2391.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
